channel.title: Some Cult Reworks
channel.description:
[details="Acolyte"] > [color=red] Acolyte, Cult, Killer :hocho: [/color] > = > Converts from Killer class types. Killer class types no longer convert into Invoker > > Passive 1: Blood Veil ~ If you die you will bleed your attacker. It will say "A Hunter or Acolyte has bled you." (Note: Prince will not get bled). You are also immune to occupation/target change. > > Day Ability 1: Faux Crimson ~ Make a player think he was Ruptured by a CL. 2 use. > > Night Ability 1: Blood Shield ~ Bleed anyone trying to attack any cult member except you. You will also bleed if someone attempted to attack the cult but you will save the rest of the cult. 2 use > > Night Ability 2: Crimson Steel ~ Bleed a player. It will show this message to them "A Hunter or Acolyte has bled you." 2 use > > Goal ~ Defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutral who seeks to harm you [/details]
[details="Cult Leader"] > > [color=red] Cult Leader, Cult, Special :star: :sparkles: [/color] > = > > Day Ability 1: Blood Of Mithras ~ Sacrifice a Cult member to Mithras at night to gain 2 uses of Offerings tonight. (Note: The cultist that is being sacrificed will be unable to talk/see cult chat as he is being sacrificed). unlimited uses. (Note: can't be used until day 3). > > Day Ability 2: Rupturing Crimson ~ Cause a player to bleed, they will die in 2 nights unless healed. 4 use. > > Night Ability 1: Brainwash ~ Attempt to Convert a player to the Cult. There may only be four Cult members at a time. Unlimited uses. 1 day recharge time > > Night Ability 2: Offerings ~ Kill two targeted players. 2 use. > > Goal ~ Defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutral that seeks to do you harm [/details]
[details="Invoker"] > [color=red] Invoker, Cult, Offensive :dagger:[/color] > = > Passive 1: Fanatic ~ Immune to occupation and target changing. > > Day Ability 1: Bewilder ~ Make a player's day ability fail. It will not inform player unless he/she tries to use it. 2 use. > > Day Ability 2: Power Of Corax ~ It will make your chain of corax/strings of mithras go through occupy/target change immunity. 1 use. > > Night Ability 1: Chains Of Corax ~ Occupy a player. 3 use. > > Night Ability 2: Strings Of Mithras ~ Control a player, choosing who they target tonight. 2 use. > > Goal ~ Defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutral who seeks to harm you [/details]
[details="Ritualist"] > [color=red] Ritualist , Cult, Support :heart: [/color] > = > > Passive 1: Will Of Mithras ~ If you are sacrificed, the Cult Leader’s Offerings ability will gain an extra charge. You are also immune to poison/bleeding > > Day Ability 1: Brotherhood ~ A chosen Cult member appear as a member of the Blue Dragon tonight. 2 use > > Night Ability 1: Teleportation ~ Swap two player's positions, causing all players targeting one of them to target the other. 3 use > > Night Ability 2: Crimson Cleanse ~ Cleanse a Cult members wounds tonight if they are attacked. Works the same like heal. 2 use > > Goal ~ Defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutral who seeks to harm you [/details]
[details="Seeker"] > [color=red] Seeker, Cult, Investigative :mag_right: [/color] > = > > Day Ability 1: Uncover ~ Reveal the next person to use his day ability to you. 2 use. > > Night Ability 1: Gaze ~ Discover a player's type. 3 use > > Night Ability 2: Seek Out ~ Seek out a player to see who visits them and who they visited at night. 2 use > > Goal ~ Defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutral who seeks to harm you [/details]
> 1. Added Acolyte as a killer convert since it doesn't make sense that killer classes become invoker having nothing of their former selves > 2. Didn't add Apostle since he is getting an official rework > 3. Added CL!!! Tell me your opinions on it > 4. Gave Invoker a better Bewilder as his bewilder right now isn't that good > 5. Gave Ritualist some Phys concepts since he didn't feel like Phys at all even though he is converted from him > 6. Made him have more of observer qualities since it freaking annoying to have claimed observer out loud then get converted and being unable to prove myself > > Feedback/suggestions are appreciated
> Changes: >= > 1. Separated Bewilder into 2 abilities, Cult Empower and Bewilder. Suggested by @NuclearBurrito > 2. Acolyte's Blood Veil will no longer affect Prince. Suggested by @Twil1ight > 3. Reduced Cult Shield's uses to 2. Suggested by @Twil1ight > 4. Changed Multiple Names. Suggested by @RHCube > 5. Removed Identify. Suggested by most voters > 6. Replaced Expose with Uncover. Suggested by @RHCube > 7. Fixed Spelling.

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Anymore feedback?

I’m sorry but I really like improving things

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Htm:

Okay but I don’t understand your ability that well. Could you please explain it more?

It’s basically dirty work but can target anyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Lily:

Just because something doesn’t make sense doesn’t mean it needs to be fixed

I was just giving an example, there are a bunch of other reasons. Like killer is the only class type that has that concept. Even the Unseen don’t have that concept

If we are not making an acolyte then Invoker at least needs 1 killer ability

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.description:
Htm:

It doesn’t make sense tho

example:

Investigative classes turn to Seeker

Support classes turn to Ritualist

Offensive classes turn to Invoker

Killer also turns into Invoker?? Like whaaa!?!

And Invoker doesn’t retain any killer ability at all

Just because something doesn’t make sense doesn’t mean it needs to be fixed. For example Alice in Wonderland most of the things don’t make sense yet it is still a fucking awesome movie.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
Not really. I think their pretty decent. Just would like to see them in game.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Would you guys like @NOBLE1 's ability, Day Ability 2: enhancement(or another name) ~ you may select two players with one of your night abilities tonight. 2 uses, for seeker or do you think seeker doesn’t need anymore than 1 day ability?

  • Yes
  • No

0 voters

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
RHCube:

This is weak. Only 2 BD classes are affected by it.

It’s also a day Ability. It’s effect is impactful enough to be good as far as day Ability’s go. Don’t underestimate the power of Tailor’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
RHCube:

I like the idea, but it’s more support than killing. Make it so it bleeds all visitors, and reduce it to 1 use. And change it so it can target anyone(even yourself). Also change the name to Crimson Shield(Or at least something other than “cult shield”.)

Thanks but I mean it’s kind of like defend so I don’t see it as “Support” since death can occur. I will change the name though

RHCube:

This is fine, but the name should be changed. Abilities shouldn’t have the name of the faction in them.

Okay but there are some classes that have “cult” in the ability. I will still change it though

RHCube:

Don’t you mean day 3?

Yup I do

RHCube:

This is weak. Only 2 BD classes are affected by it. Just change it to this: Corax’s guidance(2 use) - Choose a cultist and a cult class. They will immediately become that class. Can target yourself.

Okay but I don’t understand your ability that well. Could you please explain it more?

RHCube:

This is weak. It’s useless once the prince dies. It’s not even that useful while the prince is alive, the only information you gain from it is who the prince is not and who to not target. Change it to this: expose(2 use) - Reveal the next player to use a day ability besides the king. Tells you who they target if they target someone.

Okay I will change it

RHCube:

This is good, but it is a bit weak since it’s only 2 uses. It should determine your target’s exact class

Woah. Don’t you think that would be a bit OP if you have 3 or 2 seekers?

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Htm:

Night Ability 1: Cult Shield ~ Bleed anyone trying to attack any cult member except you. You will also bleed if someone attempted to attack the cult but you will save the rest of the cult. 2 use

I like the idea, but it’s more support than killing. Make it so it bleeds all visitors, and reduce it to 1 use. And change it so it can target anyone(even yourself). Also change the name to Crimson Shield(Or at least something other than “cult shield”.)

Htm:

Night Ability 2: Cult Steel ~ Bleed a player. It will show this message to them “A Hunter or Acolyte has bled you.” 2 use

This is fine, but the name should be changed. Abilities shouldn’t have the name of the faction in them. Crimson Steel would be fine.

Htm:

Day Ability 1: Blood Of Mithras ~ Sacrifice a Cult member to Mithras at night to gain 2 uses of Offerings tonight. (Note: The cultist that is being sacrificed will be unable to talk/see cult chat as he is being sacrificed). unlimited uses. (Note: can’t be used until night 3).

Don’t you mean day 3?

Htm:

Cult Empower

Again, the name could use a change. Just empower would be fine. Or “Power of Corax”.

Htm:

Day Ability 1: Brotherhood ~ A chosen Cult member appear as a member of the Blue Dragon tonight. 2 use

This is weak. Only 2 BD classes are affected by it. Just change it to this: Corax’s guidance(2 use) - Choose a cultist and a cult class. They will immediately become that class. Can target yourself.

Htm:

Day Ability 1: Expose ~ Reveal who the prince imprisons tonight. 2 use

This is weak. It’s useless once the prince dies. It’s not even that useful while the prince is alive, the only information you gain from it is who the prince is not and who to not target. Change it to this: expose(2 use) - Reveal the next player to use a day ability besides the king. Tells you who they target if they target someone.

Htm:

Night Ability 1: Gaze ~ Discover a player’s type. 3 use

This is good, but it is a bit weak since it’s only 2 uses. It should determine your target’s exact class.

Solic:

Too many buffs in my opinion.

The cult needs buffs though. A lot of the abilities are weak, and some classes are impossible to fake(observer)

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks

I have added CL

I’d like to hear some opinions on it please!

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
You don’t have to use my suggestion. I’m just coming up with ideas to replace the identify ability. I don’t even know if my enchantment ability is a good replacement for it, like if it’s to over powered or underpowered or just doesn’t even fit in with the class. Still I would like to hear feedback on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Oh I guess I read it wrong

Okay if the votes say to replace identifiy I will replace it with this

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
I don’t think it’s a supportive Ability because it’s a self buff Ability. It that ability worked for other members of the cult then yes it would be a supportive ability. Other then that I’m just trying to find other abilities that can replace Identify. I’m kinda against it because the only real thing it does is find Neutral players.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
NOBLE1:

Day Ability 2: enhancement(or another name) ~ you may select two players with one of your night abilities tonight. 2 uses

I feel like this may be more supportive

NOBLE1:

Other then that I love all the changes ​:+1: still waiting for that CL change.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
Htm:

Day Ability 2: Identify ~ Discover a player’s faction. You will get your results tomorrow. 2 use

If you’re talking about this ability then why not replace with an ability that allows him to select two targets with one of his night abilities. Like:

Day Ability 2: enhancement(or another name) ~ you may select two players with one of your night abilities tonight. 2 uses

Other then that I love all the changes​:+1: still waiting for that CL change.

Read full topic

I am just wondering would you prefer to have Identify or to remove it?

  • Keep Identify
  • Remove Identify

0 voters

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Twil1ight:

Overall good passive but why did you want punish the Prince for killing a scum?

I guess that’s true, I will change it

Twil1ight:

It’s more like Offensive abillity to be honest.

Yup but imo if it’s only 1 it’s okay. Butler has killing ability but he/she is still offensive

Twil1ight:

Since the Cult can have more members than Unseen, ithe can take more benefits, if you want this abillity have effect on all Cult then you need reduce to at least 2 uses. It can end being too strong

I will make it 2 uses then

Twil1ight:

Actual healing abillity for Cult and also it’s synerged with Acolyte, very nice!

Thanks!

Twil1ight:

Well done mister!

Thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
Htm:

Passive 1: Blood Veil ~ If you die you will bleed your attacker. It will say “A Hunter or Acolyte has bled you.” (Note: Even if the person who killed you was a prince he will still get bled).
You are also immune to occupation/target change.

Overall good passive but why did you want punish the Prince for killing a scum?

Htm:

Day Ability 1: Faux Rupture ~ Make a player think he was Ruptured by a CL. 2 use.

It’s more like Offensive abillity to be honest.

Htm:

Night Ability 1: Cult Shield ~ Bleed anyone trying to attack any cult member except you. You will also bleed if someone attempted to attack the cult but you will save the rest of the cult. 3 use

Since the Cult can have more members than Unseen, they can take more benefits, if you want this abillity have effect on all Cult then you need reduce to at least 2 uses. It can end being too strong.

Htm:

Night Ability 2: Crimson Cleanse ~ Cleanse a Cult members wounds tonight if they are attacked. Works the same like heal. 2 use

Actual healing abillity for Cult and also it’s synerged with Acolyte, very nice!

Htm:

Seeker, Cult, Investigative
Day Ability 1: Expose ~ Reveal who the prince imprisons tonight. 2 use

Day Ability 2: Identify ~ Discover a player’s faction. You will get your results tomorrow. 2 use

Night Ability 1: Gaze ~ Discover a player’s type. 3 use

Night Ability 2: Seek Out ~ Seek out a player to see who visits them and who they visited at night. 2 use

Goal ~ Defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutral who seeks to harm you

So he’s have a mix diferent abillities from other BD investigators. Perfect.

Maybe it’s seems they have a lot’s of buffs but even so it would make Cult more interesting faction than it is now.
Well done mister!

Read full topic
